item.title: V Rising: How to Get Primal Blood Essence
item.description:
In V Rising , the official description of Primal Blood Essence is that it is an energy source distilled from blood. More than that, it is a crucial crafting material used to craft many end-game objects and complete upgrades. You'll use Primal Blood Essence to craft weapons like the Dark Silver variant, armor like the Shadowmoon set, upgrade your Castle to levels 4 and 5, and build essential workbenches like the Anvil and Ancestral Forge .

However, there is only one way you can farm this material, which requires you to complete a handful of tasks you must complete before you can begin. Here's how to get Primal Blood Essence in V Rising .

Related
V Rising: How to Farm Spectral Dust

Spectral Dust is important for crafting in V Rising, and it can only be farmed in a few ways. Here is every method for obtaining this material.

How to Craft the Advanced Blood Press

The only way to get Primal Blood Essence in V Rising is by crafting it using an Advanced Blood Press . Once built, there are two recipes you can use to craft Primal Blood Essence that require either Exquisite Hearts or Greater Blood Essence. However, before you can build the Advanced Blood Press, you must unlock it by killing a level 57 V Blood Carrier named Jade the Vampire Hunter. Chances are you've already run into her when farming glass and quartz in the Dunley Farmlands , where she patrols the roads in this region.

Jade the Vampire Hunter likes to use long-range attacks, and will attempt to keep her distance from you. Attack her with melee weapons like axes to damage as much as possible. Once she reaches half health, she will use two powerful attacks that can kill you instantly depending on your current health, so listen to your voice cues and pay attention to her attacks to prevent this from happening. After that, you can continue to melee her without too much worry.

Where to Get Exquisite Hearts

You must engage with NPCs such as Werewolves , Night Lurkers, and Witches to obtain Exquisite Hearts in V Rising . These monsters require a gear level of 60 or higher to survive. Additionally, V Blood Carriers of level 60 or higher also have a chance to drop Exquisite Hearts. A challenging fight awaits in Gracefall Village, but you can strategize by baiting Jade The Vampire Slayer to fight Bane, making it easier to slay everything and get Exquisite Hearts.

If you aim to acquire Exquisite Hearts earlier, around gear level 50, or if you're seeking an easier time with higher gear, there's an alternative. Head to the Silverlight Hills region , located west of Dunley Farmlands. You can engage with Paladin and Knight enemies outside the wall near the docks. This method allows you to find skill jewel upgrades , making it a dual-purpose farming visit.

Where to Get Greater Blood Essence

The only way to get Greater Blood Essence in V Rising is to craft it at a Blood Press. There are two recipes that you can use to craft Greater Blood Essence. The first is unlocked by default when you first build the Blood Press and requires using Unsullied Hearts. However, you must unlock the second recipe by killing Tristan the Vampire Hunter, which uses Blood Essence instead. Tristan the Vampire Hunter is a level 47 V Blood Carrier that patrols the roads of both Farbane Woods and Dunley Farmlands.

Unlike Jade, Tristan is an extremely tough fight, especially if you are playing on Brutal difficulty . Because of this, we recommend you have a higher gear level than the game suggests. The biggest challenge is countering his spin move by watching for the spin animation, using your Veil dash to travel through him when he is close to striking you, and then staying away from him until the spin finishes. After he reaches half health, kite him and slowly chunk his life down.

item.title: Wuthering Waves: How to Increase Union Level
item.description:
Wuthering Waves will take you to a post-apocalyptic open world , where you will step into the shoes of a character named Rover who travels through a vast environment to reach the climax of your journey. However, to progress and experience the game’s full potential, you must take it to the next level by increasing your Union level.

Union Level is the main progression system in Wuthering Waves , and it helps players unlock new features and challenges. For those willing to dive deeper into the game’s lore, this guide reveals a step-by-step process for increasing their Union Level in Wuthering Waves .

4:44
Related
Wuthering Waves: Perspective Bender Domain Guide

Perspective Bender is an interesting brainteaser Domain in Wuthering Waves; here's how to complete all its puzzles.

How to Increase Union Level

In Wuthering Waves , your Union Level is the progression system tied to your account. To increase your Union Level, you need to earn Union EXP, which is primarily gained through in-game activities such as completing Wuthering Waves Main Quests and exploring the world.

Below you will find more details on how you can increase your Union Level in the game.

Complete Game Quests

Increasing your Union Level primarily involves gaining Union EXP, which can be earned through various in-game quests. There are different types of quests, each offering varying amounts of Union EXP.

Main Quests

Main Quests drive the core storyline of the game and offer the highest Union EXP rewards. Prioritizing these quests is the most efficient way to increase your Union Level.

Companion Quests

Companion Quests focus on the stories of other Resonators in the game. These quests provide substantial Union EXP, making them the second most effective method to boost your Union Level.

Side Quests

Side Quests are scattered throughout the world and can be triggered under specific circumstances. Completing these quests will grant you some Union EXP.

Exploration Quests

Exploration Quests encourage players to explore different regions and provide additional world-building lore. Completing these quests rewards you with Union EXP.

Defeat Bosses

Another way to earn Union EXP involves defeating the bosses that you come across while exploring the world. Defeating the bosses is one of the most reliable ways of farming Union EXP in the game.

You'll need to progress through the game and defeat initial enemies to unlock the bosses, as they aren't available from Level 1.

Explore SOL-3

To level up your Union, explore the world of Wuthering Waves in SOL-3. As you travel, you will see many hidden treasures, puzzles, and challenges. Completing these puzzles and challenges provides you with Union EXP, through which you can level up quickly.

item.title: Elden Ring: How To Heal Torrent
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Craft Rowa Raisin & Frozen Raisin In Elden Ring
  • How To Heal Torrent In Elden Ring

Torrent is the mount players will be able to use throughout the open world of Elden Ring to make exploration much quicker. Most of the Field Bosses can be fought on horseback to help give the player more mobility to avoid their attacks.

Like the player, Torrent will also take damage each time he is hit. After being hit a few times, Torrent will disappear but can be re-summoned with the damage still present. If players keep summoning Torrent in Elden Ring , and he keeps taking damage, he will eventually need to be respawned. Luckily, there is a way for players to heal Torrent while on horseback before he is killed.

Related
Elden Ring: 10 Bosses With The Highest HP

Players will encounter all manner of different bosses in Elden Ring, and some of them have a staggeringly large amount of HP.

How To Craft Rowa Raisin & Frozen Raisin In Elden Ring

The first and most common method for healing Torrent is by using a Rowa Raisin while on horseback. Rowa Raisins are one of the first items players can craft after getting the Crafting Kit in Elden Ring . To craft a Rowa Raisin, players will only need to use one Rowa Fruit. Rowa Fruit are small red berries that grow on bushes throughout the world of Elden Ring and are extremely common to find when exploring off the main roads. Rowa Fruit can also be picked up on horseback, making farming very easy.

After reaching the Mountaintop Of The Giants, players can find Rimed Rowa, which is a more potent Rowa Fruit. Players will first need to find Warrior's Cookbook [23] which is in the cave Northeast of the Consecrated Snowfield Site Of Grace . Frozen Raisins are crafted using just one Rimed Rowa, and offer much more health for Torrent than Rowa Fruit.

Related
Elden Ring: 10 Most Overpowered Sorceries

Not all Sorceries in Elden Ring are created equal. For players looking to completely decimate their foes, these are the most overpowered options.

How To Heal Torrent In Elden Ring

Torrent is also healed when players use a charge of the Flask of Crimson Tears, but sometimes Torrent will take damage and the player won't. The less efficient method to healing Torrent is done whenever the player rests at a Site of Grace. Doing so will fully heal Torrent along with the player and bring him back if he is dead . To use Rowa Raisins or Frozen Raisins, simply select them in your inventory and use them while on horseback. Players will need to use a lot of these fruits to fully heal Torrent, and it's best to have them added to the player's hotbar to easily use multiple quickly.

There is no limitation to how often players can use these items, doing so even in boss fights when Torrent can be ridden. It is important to note that the full feeding animation needs to finish for Torrent to receive health , and getting hit during the animation will cause it to stop. Should Torrent be fully killed and players unable to return to a Site of Grace, attempt to use the summoning whistle to get a prompt to use a Flask of Crimson Tears charge to bring Torrent back.

item.title: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door – How to Get Ms. Mowz
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Unlock Ms. Mowz in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door
  • How to Complete Elusive Badge! in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door

Ms. Mowz is a character you meet early on in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door . However, despite having an early appearance, she cannot be added to your team until you have gotten at least four Crystal Stars. She is not a part of the main story either, requiring players to search for a hidden side quest.

If you want to add this special, secret character to your roster, this article will show you exactly what you need to do. It will provide details on the prerequisites you will need, and how to complete the required side quest that unlocks the endearing Ms. Mowz .

Related
Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door – How to Pick Yoshi's Color

Yoshi can hatch into one of seven seemingly random colors in Paper Mario TTYD, but players can influence the outcome.

How to Unlock Ms. Mowz in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door

If you are still very early on in the campaign, unfortunately, you will have to wait a while before you will be able to unlock Ms. Mowz and use her as a partner. To be given the chance to pick up Ms. Mowz, you will first need to complete Chapter 4 in the game, which requires you to visit Twilight Town and defeat Doopliss using some Stylish Moves after they curse the town.

This will come after you complete all the battles in Glitzville in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door 's Chapter 3 . Then, when you've completed all the required tasks, return to Rogueport and visit the Trouble Center. This can be found on the eastern side of the city, past the guard who requires you to pay 10 Coins. The room will have a green sign above it. Head inside here, and approach the bulletin board. Scroll through the requests until you find "Elusive Badge!." You'll need to complete this to unlock Ms. Mowz.

Related
Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door - How To Get Coins Fast

Looking to get a lot of coins as quickly as possible in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door? Here are the best methods to use.

How to Complete Elusive Badge! in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door

After taking the request, make your way to the Rogueport Inn's second floor , and head out the door on the left. Then, make your way up the staircase to reach the second floor of the Rogueport Plaza, and go over to the rooftop of Zess. T's house , where you'll find Ms. Mowz.

After talking to her, she will request that you look for a particular badge for her. To do this, you will want to head back to Hooktail Castle in the Petal Meadows area, where you took the Thwomp Quiz and battled Hooktail. Remember that this spot can be visited through the underground area of Rogueport, through the green pipe on the eastern side of town. When you arrive at the Castle, you'll want to head all the way to the top where you battled Hooktail. Inside, head to the middle of the room and use Madame Flurrie to blow away the paper that is hiding a chest. Open this up, and the Elusive Badge will be inside.

Then, return to Rogueport and find Ms. Mowz on top of Zess. T's house like you did earlier. Talk to her, and you'll hand over the Elusive Badge, also known as the Attack FX B Badge. After completing the quest, Ms. Mowz will officially join your party, and she will also give back the Attack FX B Badge to Mario.

item.title: Game Rant Recap for 05/20/24 – 05/26/24
item.description:
Highlights

  • Elden Ring surprises fans with a cinematic DLC trailer for its upcoming Shadow of the Erdtree launch.
  • MultiVersus announces Jason Voorhees and Agent Smith as roster fighters.
  • Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 impresses with stunning visuals and sound design.

Today, Game Rant’s weekly recap takes a look at some of the most notable headlines from the past week: Elden Ring nearly shadow-drops a cinematic DLC story trailer a month before Shadow of the Erdtree’s launch, MultiVersus reveals two exciting characters being added to the roster, and Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2 launches as an appropriately stunning sequel to the original hit. All that and more in this week’s roundup of games industry news .

Related
Game Rant Recap for 05/13/24 – 05/19/24

Assassin's Creed Shadows reveals a cinematic trailer, Remedy teases an appearance at Summer Game Fest, and more in this week's Game Rant recap.

Elden Ring Suddenly Debuts Story Trailer

FromSoftware world-building and lore are commonly of the environmental, tangential variety. But if there’s ever going to be a clear-cut overview of what its DLC’s narrative will look like, it’s Elden Ring ’s cinematic Shadow of the Erdtree trailer , which unceremoniously aired a few hours after it was announced.

MultiVersus Reveals Jason Voorhees, The Matrix’s Agent Smith

MultiVersus is leaning on what makes every fighting game or platform-fighter special—its roster. In its latest trailer, MultiVersus revealed a wonderfully cartoony iteration of Friday the 13th ’s Jason Voorhees and The Matrix ’s Agent Smith.

Call of Duty 2024 Announced as Black Ops 6

2024’s inevitable Call of Duty will officially be Black Ops 6 . The game’s full reveal will follow the Xbox Games Showcase on June 9 at its own Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Direct .

PlayStation State of Play Once Again Rumored for End of May

A PlayStation event such as a PlayStation Showcase or State of Play has been rumored for May for quite some time. There’s now only a handful of days left this month for this to even occur, but if so it has allegedly been narrowed down to a May PlayStation State of Play due to those events’ size and spontaneity. Only time will tell now if one is scheduled to air in the next five days.

Next Doom Game Rumored to Be Medieval-Inspired

A dark fantasy medieval Doom game sounds like it’s on the horizon though nothing has been officially confirmed yet. Apparently being reserved for an announcement at the Xbox Games Showcase, the so-called Doom: The Dark Ages would be an interesting leap.

Features

Many players have likely surpassed every major milestone available in Hades 2 ’s early access story content. Still, careful and dedicated resource farming seems like the sequel’s core tenet as players attempt each run.

  • Hades 2 is at Its Best When Investing in Short-Term Goals

Movies & TV

It may be impossible to parse naturally based on its title, but The Strangers: Chapter 1 isn’t a prequel like it may seem. Instead, it’s a brand-new reboot, and the ending is a purposeful cliffhanger meant to lead into the second and third chapters of a trilogy shot back to back.

  • The Strangers: Chapter 1 Ending, Explained

Guides

Helldivers 2 isn’t nearly the best-optimized game on PC. Thankfully, some setting defaults and tweaks can make it far smoother.

  • Helldivers 2: Best PC Settings to Improve FPS & Gameplay

Game Rant Exclusives

Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2 excels with phenomenal visuals and sound design, not unlike its predecessor. That said, its gameplay systems are elementary, making it a graphical showcase more than an interactive experience in many ways.

  • Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2 Review
